title: Minecraft Movie 4K Blu-Ray & Digital Release Dates Revealed - Steelbook Preorders In Stock
description: A Minecraft Movie Limited Edition Steelbook (4K Blu-ray) $38 | Releases June 24 Preorder at Amazon Preorder at Walmart A Minecraft Movie: Collector's Crafting Table Edition (Walmart Exclusive) $35 | Releases June 24 Preorder at Walmart A Minecraft Movie (4K Blu-ray) $30 | Releases June 24 Preorder at Amazon Preorder at Walmart Minecraft fans will be able to watch the wildly popular film adaptation from the comfort of their couches soon. Though preorders for the various Blu-ray editions have been available since the film hit theaters on April 4, the home video release dates weren't announced until May 7. But we now know that A Minecraft Movie releases in digital format on May 13, and the 4K Blu-ray release will follow on June 24. You can preorder the digital version on Prime Video for $25. Multiple physical editions are up for grabs, including A Minecraft Movie's Limited Edition Steelbook on 4K Blu-ray and Walmart's exclusive (and very cool) Crafting Table Edition on 1080p Blu-ray.A Minecraft Movie pulled in mixed reviews from critics, but it has proven to be a massive hit with audiences across the globe. The family-friendly film starring Jack Black, Jason Momoa, and Jennifer Coolidge is closing in on $900 million at the box office.Continue Reading at GameSpot

title: Bravely Default HD Remaster For Nintendo Switch 2 Is Finally Up For Preorder
description: Bravely Default: Flying Fairy HD Remaster $40 | Releases June 5 Preorder at Walmart Preorder at Best Buy Preorder at GameStop Preorder at Target Bravely Default: Flying Fairy HD Remaster was one of the few Nintendo Switch 2 launch games that wasn't available to buy when Switch 2 console preorders opened in April. Listings for the upcoming turn-based RPG from Square Enix have been featured on retailer websites for about a month now, but preorders only just started popping up on May 6. If you're interested in picking up the Switch 2's most affordable launch game with a physical edition--it's only $40--you can preorder Bravely Default HD Remaster ahead of its June 5 release.Bravely Default originally released as a Nintendo 3DS exclusive in Japan in 2012. An expanded edition launched the following year, and that version received an English translation in 2014.Continue Reading at GameSpot

title: FTC loses latest appeal in ongoing battle against Microsoft's Activision Blizzard acquisition
description: A year and a half after Microsoft's purchase of Activision Blizzard for $69bn, the US Federal Trade Commission's continuing attempts to block the deal might finally have come to an end following the 9th Circuit Court's decision to deny its appeal of a 2023 lower court ruling. Read more

title: Makeup and Beauty Blog Monday Poll, Vol. 877
description: So…what is the Monday Poll? Excellent question! It isn’t, contrary to its name, an actual poll, like with little clicky buttons. It’s just a list of more or less random questions I’ve been posting on this blog every Monday morning for the past quadrillion years (since 2007). 1. Pick how much ice you’d like in your drink: all the way to the brim, half full, a few cubes or no ice at all? Half full, please. That’s purr-fect! 2. Have you ever raised a puppy or a kitten? Yes. It’s a wonderful experience, but be prepared to have your nice things destroyed! Oh, and you can forget about your couch ever looking pristine again. 3. How often do you hit the snooze button in the morning? Just once. I used to just get up when the alarm went right off, but lately, eh, I’ve been loving a little extra sleep. 4. What decade has the best clothes? I’m probably biased because I wish I could go back to 1998 at least once a day, but[Continue reading...] The post Makeup and Beauty Blog Monday Poll, Vol. 877 appeared first on Makeup and Beauty Blog | Makeup Reviews, Swatches and How-To Makeup.
author: Karen

title: Makeup and Beauty Blog Monday Poll, Vol. 876
description: So…what is the Monday Poll? Excellent question! It isn’t, contrary to its name, an actual poll, like with little clicky buttons. It’s just a list of more or less random questions I’ve been posting on this blog every Monday morning for the past quadrillion years (since 2007). 1. What sports would you have liked to have played as a kid? I would’ve loved to have taken dance classes. I think I would’ve enjoyed soccer, too. 2. Would you rather listen to the radio or replay a favorite album? Replay a favorite album. Speaking of that, my family will probably freak out if I play the greatest hits from Fleetwood Mac one more time. 3. Have you ever had a job where you had to be on your feet all day? Yup. I’ve done retail and worked in the back of the house in a bakery. Gotta have supportive shoes! 4. Do you have any travel plans for the summer? Right now we’ve got one camping trip to the Russian River planned, and that’s it. I[Continue reading...] The post Makeup and Beauty Blog Monday Poll, Vol. 876 appeared first on Makeup and Beauty Blog | Makeup Reviews, Swatches and How-To Makeup.
author: Karen
